title: Mobile
description: We are following mobile security best practices

Client data storage: No sensitive data is included in backups generated by native clients
We are not hardcoding any keys or secrets
We remove user cached data when the user logout
Logging: We are not logging sensitive data (e.g. user password, session token, etc)
We are not logging verbose error or debugging messages
Android: We are not using MODE_WORLD_WRITEABLE or MODE_WORLD_READABLE
We are only requesting the minimum set of permissions necessary in `AndroidManifest.xml`
We are only displaying trusted content to `webview`
iOS: We are not using NSUserDefaults or plist to store sensitive data
We are only displaying trusted content to `UIWebviews`
